GSD.description:
ALSA: pcm: Test for "silence" field in struct "pcm_format_data"

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.112 by commit 912797e54c99a98f0722f21313e13a3938bb6dba. For more details please see the references link.
